author: smuzaffar
body: Looks like `ls -lh` under ASAN IB environment is misbehaving and allocates a lot memory ( see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47744#issuecomment-2794048311 ). This PR is to comment out the directory contents info message and see it this fixes the ASAN IBs unit test issue
title: [ASAN] comment out system command to debug asan IB issue
